live ticker : angola 0:1 portugal -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 11.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 23.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 live ticker : angola 0:1 portugal review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . group d : angola-portugal welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker for the last game of the 2006 world cup 's third day .
angola play their former colonial rulers portugal in day 's second group d game .
who will be on the field ?
here is a look at the starting lineups : angola : 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 8-andre macanga , 7-paulo figueiredo , 14-mendonca , 11-mateus ; 10-akwa -lrb- c -rrb- , 17-ze kalanga coach : luis oliveira goncalves portugal : 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 14-nunovalente ; 19-tiago , 11-sabrosa , 8-petit ; 7-luis figo -lrb- c -rrb- , 9-pauleta , 17-cristiano ronaldo coach : luis felipe scolari referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- an underdog in the truest sense of the term , expect angola to hang back and defend against an aggressively oriented portugal .
1. min .
we 're off portugal starts with the ball .
1. min .
what a start it is ! 14 seconds into the game and the ball is already rolling past the far post .
pauleta nearly got possibly the fastest goal in world cup history .
3. min .
figo crosses and angolan keeper joao ricardo gets his hands on the ball that was too close to his goal for portugal to make anything of .
3. min .
goal portugal ! 4. min .
pauleta did n't waste any time taking the pass from figo , who drew two defenders toward him , and drilling it into the back of the net .
7. min .
cutting the whole defense c. ronaldo dribbles through half the angola defense and is only stopped by stepping on the ball himself .
8. min .
corner angola akwa gives ricardo a bit of push while going up to head the ball away from the goalie and is called for a foul .
10. min .
akwa goes down after giving up one goal , angola push forward with a drive down the right side and akwa is able to head a weak ball towards to goal before falling to the ground .
12. min .
portugal line up a free kick .
12. min .
petit fires a shot that will certainly leave a bruise into the 4-man wall .
15. min .
joao ricardo hit in the stomach a collision between pauleta 's shin and the angolan keeper 's midsection has ricardo on the ground .
hopefully he 's only had the wind knocked out of him .
16. min .
with a bit of ice and a stretch , he 's ready to continue between the pipes .
18. min .
delgado tosses in a short throw-in ; miguel is there first to clear it to midfield .
19. min .
portugal are slowing down the portuguese players are slowing down the game 's tempo , making the rough and tumble angolans look decent .
22. min .
lonely in the back the portuguese defenders have moved up to midfield , leaving goalkeeper ricardo with only the fans in the stands behind the goal to chat to .
24. min .
simano and figo pass between each other , and simano puts the ball over goal , much to ronaldo 's chagrin as he was wide open on the flank .
24. min .
angola shoots mateus unloads from 35 yards out .
the ball sails over the crossbar , but it was enough for fans of both teams to take a gasp .
25. min .
akwa earns praise a bike kick inside the penalty area and now the portuguese defenders are beginning to pull at the forward 's jersey . maybe angola is n't as harmless as everyone thought ? 26. min .
yellow for c. ronaldo the ref warns ronaldo that he is n't at a judo match and gives yellow for a violent kick .
28. min .
this time jamba gets yellow a late tackle earns a booking for the angolan defender .
30. min .
half and hour into the game and angola are showing their passion for soccer with drives forward and aggressive attacks on every 50-50 ball .
32. min .
surprised that the ball landed in front of him , ronaldo is n't able to convert on a cross alone at goal .
34. min .
figueiredo tries his luck at a long-range shot , but it floats well-wide of the post .
35. min .
ding !
ronaldo hammers a header off a figo corner solidly into the crossbar and grabs at his hair in desperation .
37. min .
stymied by delgado 's arm , ronaldo , a well-known hot head who has already been booked once , works to keep his emotions in check .
38. min .
pauleta does n't get any power behind his header and joao ricardo collects it and send the ball to soaring to the center circle .
40. min .
simano slips at the edge of the box , the fans want a penalty kick , but the portuguese player does n't give the referee a look .
42. min .
ronaldo fouled again .
are the angolans trying to provoke him into getting another card and tossed out of the game ? 43. min .
macanga rifles a shot at goal that ricardo can only block over the end line .
nothing comes of the resulting corner .
45. min .
ronaldo rockets a shot after receiving the back pass and ricardo parries it in all-star style .
another case of bad luck for the portuguese .
two minutes of injury time in cologne .
45 + 2. min .
yellow for loco an extended leg attack against figo gets loco a place in the ref 's book .
45 + 2. min .
that 's it for the first half though the scoreboard does n't show the expected blowout -lrb- yet ? -rrb- , on the field , today 's third game has looked like the varsity scrimmaging the jv team .
whenever figo and co. pick up the pace it 's all angola can do to follow the ball back .
46. min .
the second half is underway ! 46. min .
no changes to either team for the second 45 minutes .
47. min .
tiago lifts the ball to simano , ricardo is there to stop the shot .
48. min .
just three minutes in , but ... ... the angolan defenders are doing a better job of swarming around the ball in their own end , keeping portugal from stringing together their trademark passes .
50. min .
what did i do ?
tiago draws a foul in a dangerous spot for figo 's foot .
51. min .
unsure of himself in the goal box , ricardo looses the ball but can take heart in the fact he may have missed it because he was pushed .
52. min .
macanga gets yellow macanga takes out the legs of luis figo - right in front of the ref 's eyes - and is booked .
55. min .
not until the portuguese get into the penalty box , do the angolans seem willing to defend .
57. min .
figo 's corner too long but loco heads it over the line for another corner .
simano shoots , but it 's blocked easily .
59. min .
in a 4-3 pauleta decides to go it alone .
his shot is n't placed well enough and ricardo snaps it out of the air .
60. min .
mantorras is in for akwa the captain hands the armband over to figueiredo .
60. min .
ronaldo makes space for costinha 61. min .
tiago helps in the midfield build up and when the ball comes back to him he fires at goal , ricardo falls on it and punts it away .
63. min .
the magic is missing portugal are doing enough to win the game an hour in , but the artistry expected against a lesser opponent has yet to appear .
65. min .
tiago gets the scorn of the crowd in the form of whistles for his uncreative back pass when supporters had hoped for a quick counter .
67. min .
miguel sprints with the ball toward goal , but kali breaks up the run .
68. min .
what should we do now ?
more than a little bored with what 's happening on the pitch , the crowd has decided to get the wave going .
70. min .
edson comes on for ze kalanga .
71. min .
mantorras , who just came into the game , is set up with angola 's best chance at a chance on goal , but connects with his shin pad instead of his shoe .
73. min .
defensive change for portugal petit is out for maniche .
figo can also be found on the sideline , but he 's only changing his shoes .
76. min .
mexico and iran wo n't be sure what to make of angola or portugal after this match .
the portuguese have a team of excellent players who are n't putting anything together , and angola looks able to stop most of what portugal throws at them .
78. min .
figo shakes his head taking on the current national dance , figo shakes his head in disgust - it 's a move all the portuguese players have been practicing tonight in a disappointing match .
80. min .
nuno valente sees yellow a tackle from behind on mendonca gets valente booked .
81. min .
miloy comes in for figueiredo 82. min .
hugo viana comes on for tiago 84. min .
simano comes close a header goes over the crossbar as simano is closely marked .
83. min .
what a result ! ?
angola wo n't have anything to fear if they bring this result back home .
the portuguese can expect plenty of criticism if the score line does n't change soon .
87. min .
pauleta twists and turns , it 's unclear if he stumbles over his own feet or if an angolan defender is able to poke the ball away .
88. min .
how wide is a field ?
plenty of whistles from the crowd as portugal measure the field 's width in a series of six passes .
89. min .
chance for angola mateus deflects a cross into a corner of the portuguese goal - ricardo is just able to get his hands on it in a shot that brought screams from the angolan fans .
three minutes of injury time in the second half 90 + 1. min .
simano crosses long to figo lets go in time for maniche to fire a shot ricardo pushes over the crossbar .
90 + 3. min .
that 's it in cologne !
and with an immense roar of happiness that the sluggish game has come to an end , the crowd begins to file out of the fifa world cup stadium cologne . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9799 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de germany -pipe- 11.06.2006 germans protest against ahmadinejad , racism as cup opens großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : demonstrators in nuremberg protest against anti-semitism and ahmadinejad thousands took to the streets in two german cities , both world cup venues , over the weekend to protest against iranian president ahmadinejad and a far-right march . some 1,200 people joined a rally against iranian president mahmoud ahmadinejad in the southern german city of nuremberg on sunday , ahead of a world cup match between iran and mexico . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : demonstrators in nuremberg on sunday waving israeli flags , the demonstrators attacked ahmadinejad 's anti-israel rhetoric and repeated denial of the holocaust at the protest organized by the local jewish community and the german trade union alliance .
bavarian state interior minister günther beckstein said the demonstration was not targeted against the iranian team or the iranian people but against " a man who has placed himself outside civilization . " " a criminal like ahmadinejad is not welcome -lrb- in germany -rrb- , " he said . " let us show that bavaria and germany as well as the entire western world stand firmly by israel and our jewish fellow citizens . " police said the event went off without incident . ahmadinejad condemned for holocaust comments ahmadinejad has been widely condemned for describing the holocaust as a " myth " and calling for israel to be " wiped off the map " . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ahmadinejad 's comments about the holocaust have sparked anger worldwide he has said he would like to attend the soccer ball extravaganza running through july 9 but has made no firm plans .
a source close to him said he would be watching sunday 's game on television in his office in tehran . iranian vice president mohammad aliabadi was granted a german visa and visited the iranian team in nuremberg saturday ahead of their first world cup match sunday . michel friedman , a television presenter and high-profile member of germany 's jewish community , told the rally it was scandalous that aliabadi had been allowed to enter the country . knobloch warns of " anti-semitic alliance " charlotte knobloch , the newly appointed head of germany 's central council of jews said she was worried about an " explosive anti-semitic alliance . " writing in an article in bild am sonntag , knobloch pointed out that neo-nazis in germany wanted to use a game between iran and angola on june 21 in leipzig to " declare their solidarity with the tyrant from tehran . "
knobloch warned that germany could n't just watch events idly . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : charlotte knobloch " we have to prevent that the enemies of the constitution and the iranian dictator do n't join forces to form an anti-semitic alliance , " knobloch wrote . earlier , police broke up a pro-iranian rally by neo-nazis in nuremberg , a former nazi stronghold . the 16 men and women there were dressed in iranian jerseys , hoisting iranian flags and distributing flyers demanding that the demonstration against ahmadinejad be banned , police spokesman peter grösch .
amid the controversy , iran coach branko ivankovic told reporters saturday to stop asking him about politics .
" these political questions are not for me .
i think it 's not for me and it 's not for people here .
please just ask about my team against mexico , " said the croatian . standing up against racism separately , german politicians and celebrities joined thousands of citizens and activists in the western german city of gelsenkirchen on saturday to send a strong message against neo-nazism and xenophobia . the gelsenkirchen event was meant to counter a march planned by the far-right national democratic party -lrb- npd -rrb- on saturday , a day after the city of gelsenkirchen hosted an opening world cup game between poland and ecuador . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : müntefering and the ambassador of ecuador horacio sevilla borja addressing the estimated 5,000 people who gathered in gelsenkirchen to protest against the far-right , germany 's vice chancellor franz müntefering accused the npd of wanting to hijack the soccer world cup in germany to sow xenophobia . " this brown sauce should never again get a chance in germany , never again , " said müntefering .
" we want all people to be able to live here in germany irrespective of their skin color , passport , name and religion .
no one should be scared , " he said . racism debate in germany müntefering 's comments follow warnings last month by a former government spokesman who now heads an anti-racist organization that black soccer fans visiting the country during the world cup should avoid going to areas where neo-nazi attacks had taken place . his remarks triggered fierce debate in germany about so-called no-go areas for dark-skinned foreigners and were followed by a suspected racist attack on a politician of turkish-kurdish origin in eastern berlin . a string of other racist attacks in the east of the country have also put the country on edge . " world attention focused on germany " president of germany 's parliament , the bundestag , norbert lammert , underscored the importance of the anti-neo-nazi demonstration on saturday at a time when the world is looking at germany and particularly gelsenkirchen which hosts a number of world cup games . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : fans from all over the world are in germany for the world cup " world attention wo n't focused on germany in the next few years the way that it is at present and in the coming weeks , " lammert said . " that 's why we have to lay emphasis on germany presenting itself the way it is : open to the world , tolerant and naturally friendly to foreigners , " he said . dw staff -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de leaders say germany open to the world , but urge caution days before the world cup kicks off , leading politicians have underlined germany 's open and tolerant nature .
but chancellor merkel has warned the country must remain vigilant to the threat of attacks against foreigners .
-lrb- june 6 , 2006 -rrb- can the world cup withstand heated race debate ?
germany is working hard to prevent the far right from hijacking the soccer world cup and promote a positive image weeks before the event opens .
will ongoing controversy over racism get in the way ?
-lrb- may 23 , 2006 -rrb- german interior minister : " people will feel safe " in an interview with dw-tv , german interior and sports minister wolfgang schäuble said that all measures had been taken to ensure that the biggest event in germany 's modern history will be safe .
-lrb- june 3 , 2006 -rrb- 9799 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour .

live ticker : angola 0:1 portugal -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 11.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 17.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 live ticker : angola 0:1 portugal review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . group d : angola-portugal welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker for the last game of the 2006 world cup 's third day .
angola play their former colonial rulers portugal in day 's second group d game .
who will be on the field ?
here is a look at the starting lineups : angola : 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 8-andre macanga , 7-paulo figueiredo , 14-mendonca , 11-mateus ; 10-akwa -lrb- c -rrb- , 17-ze kalanga coach : luis oliveira goncalves portugal : 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 14-nunovalente ; 19-tiago , 11-sabrosa , 8-petit ; 7-luis figo -lrb- c -rrb- , 9-pauleta , 17-cristiano ronaldo coach : luis felipe scolari referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- an underdog in the truest sense of the term , expect angola to hang back and defend against an aggressively oriented portugal .
1. min .
we 're off portugal starts with the ball .
1. min .
what a start it is ! 14 seconds into the game and the ball is already rolling past the far post .
pauleta nearly got possibly the fastest goal in world cup history .
3. min .
figo crosses and angolan keeper joao ricardo gets his hands on the ball that was too close to his goal for portugal to make anything of .
3. min .
goal portugal ! 4. min .
pauleta did n't waste any time taking the pass from figo , who drew two defenders toward him , and drilling it into the back of the net .
7. min .
cutting the whole defense c. ronaldo dribbles through half the angola defense and is only stopped by stepping on the ball himself .
8. min .
corner angola akwa gives ricardo a bit of push while going up to head the ball away from the goalie and is called for a foul .
10. min .
akwa goes down after giving up one goal , angola push forward with a drive down the right side and akwa is able to head a weak ball towards to goal before falling to the ground .
12. min .
portugal line up a free kick .
12. min .
petit fires a shot that will certainly leave a bruise into the 4-man wall .
15. min .
joao ricardo hit in the stomach a collision between pauleta 's shin and the angolan keeper 's midsection has ricardo on the ground .
hopefully he 's only had the wind knocked out of him .
16. min .
with a bit of ice and a stretch , he 's ready to continue between the pipes .
18. min .
delgado tosses in a short throw-in ; miguel is there first to clear it to midfield .
19. min .
portugal are slowing down the portuguese players are slowing down the game 's tempo , making the rough and tumble angolans look decent .
22. min .
lonely in the back the portuguese defenders have moved up to midfield , leaving goalkeeper ricardo with only the fans in the stands behind the goal to chat to .
24. min .
simano and figo pass between each other , and simano puts the ball over goal , much to ronaldo 's chagrin as he was wide open on the flank .
24. min .
angola shoots mateus unloads from 35 yards out .
the ball sails over the crossbar , but it was enough for fans of both teams to take a gasp .
25. min .
akwa earns praise a bike kick inside the penalty area and now the portuguese defenders are beginning to pull at the forward 's jersey . maybe angola is n't as harmless as everyone thought ? 26. min .
yellow for c. ronaldo the ref warns ronaldo that he is n't at a judo match and gives yellow for a violent kick .
28. min .
this time jamba gets yellow a late tackle earns a booking for the angolan defender .
30. min .
half and hour into the game and angola are showing their passion for soccer with drives forward and aggressive attacks on every 50-50 ball .
32. min .
surprised that the ball landed in front of him , ronaldo is n't able to convert on a cross alone at goal .
34. min .
figueiredo tries his luck at a long-range shot , but it floats well-wide of the post .
35. min .
ding !
ronaldo hammers a header off a figo corner solidly into the crossbar and grabs at his hair in desperation .
37. min .
stymied by delgado 's arm , ronaldo , a well-known hot head who has already been booked once , works to keep his emotions in check .
38. min .
pauleta does n't get any power behind his header and joao ricardo collects it and send the ball to soaring to the center circle .
40. min .
simano slips at the edge of the box , the fans want a penalty kick , but the portuguese player does n't give the referee a look .
42. min .
ronaldo fouled again .
are the angolans trying to provoke him into getting another card and tossed out of the game ? 43. min .
macanga rifles a shot at goal that ricardo can only block over the end line .
nothing comes of the resulting corner .
45. min .
ronaldo rockets a shot after receiving the back pass and ricardo parries it in all-star style .
another case of bad luck for the portuguese .
two minutes of injury time in cologne .
45 + 2. min .
yellow for loco an extended leg attack against figo gets loco a place in the ref 's book .
45 + 2. min .
that 's it for the first half though the scoreboard does n't show the expected blowout -lrb- yet ? -rrb- , on the field , today 's third game has looked like the varsity scrimmaging the jv team .
whenever figo and co. pick up the pace it 's all angola can do to follow the ball back .
46. min .
the second half is underway ! 46. min .
no changes to either team for the second 45 minutes .
47. min .
tiago lifts the ball to simano , ricardo is there to stop the shot .
48. min .
just three minutes in , but ... ... the angolan defenders are doing a better job of swarming around the ball in their own end , keeping portugal from stringing together their trademark passes .
50. min .
what did i do ?
tiago draws a foul in a dangerous spot for figo 's foot .
51. min .
unsure of himself in the goal box , ricardo looses the ball but can take heart in the fact he may have missed it because he was pushed .
52. min .
macanga gets yellow macanga takes out the legs of luis figo - right in front of the ref 's eyes - and is booked .
55. min .
not until the portuguese get into the penalty box , do the angolans seem willing to defend .
57. min .
figo 's corner too long but loco heads it over the line for another corner .
simano shoots , but it 's blocked easily .
59. min .
in a 4-3 pauleta decides to go it alone .
his shot is n't placed well enough and ricardo snaps it out of the air .
60. min .
mantorras is in for akwa the captain hands the armband over to figueiredo .
60. min .
ronaldo makes space for costinha 61. min .
tiago helps in the midfield build up and when the ball comes back to him he fires at goal , ricardo falls on it and punts it away .
63. min .
the magic is missing portugal are doing enough to win the game an hour in , but the artistry expected against a lesser opponent has yet to appear .
65. min .
tiago gets the scorn of the crowd in the form of whistles for his uncreative back pass when supporters had hoped for a quick counter .
67. min .
miguel sprints with the ball toward goal , but kali breaks up the run .
68. min .
what should we do now ?
more than a little bored with what 's happening on the pitch , the crowd has decided to get the wave going .
70. min .
edson comes on for ze kalanga .
71. min .
mantorras , who just came into the game , is set up with angola 's best chance at a chance on goal , but connects with his shin pad instead of his shoe .
73. min .
defensive change for portugal petit is out for maniche .
figo can also be found on the sideline , but he 's only changing his shoes .
76. min .
mexico and iran wo n't be sure what to make of angola or portugal after this match .
the portuguese have a team of excellent players who are n't putting anything together , and angola looks able to stop most of what portugal throws at them .
78. min .
figo shakes his head taking on the current national dance , figo shakes his head in disgust - it 's a move all the portuguese players have been practicing tonight in a disappointing match .
80. min .
nuno valente sees yellow a tackle from behind on mendonca gets valente booked .
81. min .
miloy comes in for figueiredo 82. min .
hugo viana comes on for tiago 84. min .
simano comes close a header goes over the crossbar as simano is closely marked .
83. min .
what a result ! ?
angola wo n't have anything to fear if they bring this result back home .
the portuguese can expect plenty of criticism if the score line does n't change soon .
87. min .
pauleta twists and turns , it 's unclear if he stumbles over his own feet or if an angolan defender is able to poke the ball away .
88. min .
how wide is a field ?
plenty of whistles from the crowd as portugal measure the field 's width in a series of six passes .
89. min .
chance for angola mateus deflects a cross into a corner of the portuguese goal - ricardo is just able to get his hands on it in a shot that brought screams from the angolan fans .
three minutes of injury time in the second half 90 + 1. min .
simano crosses long to figo lets go in time for maniche to fire a shot ricardo pushes over the crossbar .
90 + 3. min .
that 's it in cologne !
and with an immense roar of happiness that the sluggish game has come to an end , the crowd begins to file out of the fifa world cup stadium cologne . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9799 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

flying dutchmen plan raid on fortress serbia & montenegro -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 11.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 flying dutchmen plan raid on fortress serbia & montenegro großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the dutch have added a new harmony to their free-scoring squad of cup contenders the attacking flair of the netherlands will come up against the armor-plated defense of serbia and montenegro when the two sides meet in their opening group c game in leipzig sunday . the two sides will be battling for vital points in their rightly-dubbed " group of death " that also includes two-time world cup winners argentina and this year 's african nations runners-up , ivory coast - also the continent 's strongest team in germany . winning the group will ensure a much easier passage to the quarter-finals and will likely mean avoiding brazil . dutch coach marco van basten , who won the european championship title in 1988 as a player , but is bidding to deliver the dutch their first ever world cup after two losing appearances in the 1974 and 1978 finals , has a wealth of attacking options from which to pick . they include chelsea 's arjen robben , feyenoord 's dirk kuyt , arsenal 's robin van persie and ruud van nistlerooy , a feared goal scorer with something to prove given his current state of limbo at manchester united after falling out with alex ferguson . with van basten employing a 4-3-3 system with two wingers , the onus will be on the forwards to break down serbia and montenegro 's teak-tough defense . montenegro might just have voted for independence from larger cousin serbia , but their defense was united enough to remarkably leak only one goal in 10 qualifying games , that in a 1-1 draw with spain . but they too recognize that they will have their work cut out to contain the dutch , who had the best points-per-game average in qualifying of all of the 32 nations taking part in the world cup - despite being grouped with the czech republic , romania , finland and macedonia in their qualifiers . legend van basten remains grounded as team flies bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : former striker van basten knows about winning in germany " i hope that in effect our performances -lrb- in germany -rrb- in 1974 and 1988 are not merely coincidental , " said van basten , who took over the reins from dick advocaat following euro 2004 when the dutch went out in the semi-finals . " instead i would like us to rubberstamp the idea that we feel good when we play in germany . " " we should benefit from playing so close to home , " van basten said as 15,000 fans turned out to watch the first public dutch training session in freiburg on thursday . " we sense this enthusiasm .
it is now for the players to take that onto the pitch , " said the coach who raised some eyebrows before the tournament when he ditched several of the old guard such as midfielders clarence seedorf and edgar davids , who were often linked with dressing room dissent . winger robben looking no further than opening game bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : first serbia & montenegro then the world for arjen robben robben admitted that group c was probably the toughest of the first stage and that a moment 's hesitation could prove fatal in deciding who progressed to the second round . " i do n't really want to think about the tournament as a whole at the moment but rather focus on the first match against serbia-montenegro , " said robben .
" they are a solid side with classy individuals .
but we also have a squad packed with quality .
we think together , we play really tightly and i am very confident . " " the dutch have players who can take us a long way in the tournament , " robben added .
" however we have to stay alert .
because in our group it may be the merest thing that makes the difference .
it will be a shame to play well but to lose everything because of a slip of concentration . " serb defender goran gavrancic , who plays for dynamo kiev , said : " it is realistic that we can record a good result against the netherlands .
we have the best defense in the qualifiers , and the netherlands has the best attack .
we want to stop them showing it against us . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup team checks : serbia & montenegro emerging from a recent history scarred by war , the serbia and montenegro team have a chance to aid their country 's healing process with a proud showing at the world cup in germany this summer .
world cup team checks : the netherlands the " oranje " are one of the world cup 's most enigmatic teams .
the dutch regularly produce teams of exceptional skill and attacking prowess but have yet to win the greatest prize .
www-links fifa world cup 2006 the official hompage of the 2006 fifa world cup in germany .
feedback can the dutch fulfill the considerable potential and win the world cup this year ?
please include your full name and country with any any reply .

flying dutchmen plan raid on fortress serbia & montenegro -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 11.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 17.01.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 flying dutchmen plan raid on fortress serbia & montenegro großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the dutch have added a new harmony to their free-scoring squad of cup contenders the attacking flair of the netherlands will come up against the armor-plated defense of serbia and montenegro when the two sides meet in their opening group c game in leipzig sunday . the two sides will be battling for vital points in their rightly-dubbed " group of death " that also includes two-time world cup winners argentina and this year 's african nations runners-up , ivory coast - also the continent 's strongest team in germany . winning the group will ensure a much easier passage to the quarter-finals and will likely mean avoiding brazil . dutch coach marco van basten , who won the european championship title in 1988 as a player , but is bidding to deliver the dutch their first ever world cup after two losing appearances in the 1974 and 1978 finals , has a wealth of attacking options from which to pick . they include chelsea 's arjen robben , feyenoord 's dirk kuyt , arsenal 's robin van persie and ruud van nistlerooy , a feared goal scorer with something to prove given his current state of limbo at manchester united after falling out with alex ferguson . with van basten employing a 4-3-3 system with two wingers , the onus will be on the forwards to break down serbia and montenegro 's teak-tough defense . montenegro might just have voted for independence from larger cousin serbia , but their defense was united enough to remarkably leak only one goal in 10 qualifying games , that in a 1-1 draw with spain . but they too recognize that they will have their work cut out to contain the dutch , who had the best points-per-game average in qualifying of all of the 32 nations taking part in the world cup - despite being grouped with the czech republic , romania , finland and macedonia in their qualifiers . legend van basten remains grounded as team flies bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : former striker van basten knows about winning in germany " i hope that in effect our performances -lrb- in germany -rrb- in 1974 and 1988 are not merely coincidental , " said van basten , who took over the reins from dick advocaat following euro 2004 when the dutch went out in the semi-finals . " instead i would like us to rubberstamp the idea that we feel good when we play in germany . " " we should benefit from playing so close to home , " van basten said as 15,000 fans turned out to watch the first public dutch training session in freiburg on thursday . " we sense this enthusiasm .
it is now for the players to take that onto the pitch , " said the coach who raised some eyebrows before the tournament when he ditched several of the old guard such as midfielders clarence seedorf and edgar davids , who were often linked with dressing room dissent . winger robben looking no further than opening game bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : first serbia & montenegro then the world for arjen robben robben admitted that group c was probably the toughest of the first stage and that a moment 's hesitation could prove fatal in deciding who progressed to the second round . " i do n't really want to think about the tournament as a whole at the moment but rather focus on the first match against serbia-montenegro , " said robben .
" they are a solid side with classy individuals .
but we also have a squad packed with quality .
we think together , we play really tightly and i am very confident . " " the dutch have players who can take us a long way in the tournament , " robben added .
" however we have to stay alert .
because in our group it may be the merest thing that makes the difference .
it will be a shame to play well but to lose everything because of a slip of concentration . " serb defender goran gavrancic , who plays for dynamo kiev , said : " it is realistic that we can record a good result against the netherlands .
we have the best defense in the qualifiers , and the netherlands has the best attack .
we want to stop them showing it against us . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de world cup team checks : serbia & montenegro emerging from a recent history scarred by war , the serbia and montenegro team have a chance to aid their country 's healing process with a proud showing at the world cup in germany this summer .
world cup team checks : the netherlands the " oranje " are one of the world cup 's most enigmatic teams .
the dutch regularly produce teams of exceptional skill and attacking prowess but have yet to win the greatest prize .
www-links fifa world cup 2006 the official hompage of the 2006 fifa world cup in germany .
feedback can the dutch fulfill the considerable potential and win the world cup this year ?
please include your full name and country with any any reply .

crunch time comes early for iran against seeded mexico -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 11.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 26.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 crunch time comes early for iran against seeded mexico großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : there 'll be no lack of support for iran as the team aims to escape the group stage mexico will be looking to kill off iran 's world cup hopes at the first hurdle on sunday as the world number four begin their campaign to make it past the quarter-finals for the first time . the surprise group d seeds , who have a point to prove after some unflattering reaction to their exalted status , will have been buoyed by iran 's injury problems and indifferent recent form . however they might also take the field without top-rated goalkeeper oswaldo sanchez , who has flown home following his father 's sudden death and is expected to be back hours before the match .
sanchez 's availability for the game will depend on his mental and emotional state . the opening match is seen as critical to the hopes of both teams in a group which also contains portugal and angola . " this is the most important game .
we know the game against portugal will be really hard also so we really need to gain points in this game , " said iran skipper ali daei . mexico will hope to shrug off sanchez 's likely absence and their own unpromising build-up which saw them lose 2-1 to a second-string netherlands team . however a fourth-place finish in last year 's confederations cup - including a 1-0 win over brazil - and a 20-match unbeaten streak have instilled a strong sense of self-belief in ricardo lavolpe 's squad . " mexico are very compact , aggressive and fast - actually , they 're excellent , " said lavolpe 's opposite number branko ivankovic . " sometimes they 're playing very boring , but very successful . " mexico looking to justify top four ranking key player is barcelona rock rafael marquez , who will be looking to make amends for his red card in the knock-out defeat to the united states four years ago . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the talismanic jared borgetti -lrb- l . -rrb- has a point to prove mexico 's all-time top-scorer jared borgetti , who totted up a world-best 14 goals in qualifying , will be hoping to send a message to club manager sam allardyce who left him languishing on the bolton bench this season . mexico have qualified for 13 world cups but have never done better than the last eight on home ground in 1970 and 1986 , reaching the second round in the last three competitions . lavolpe , a member of argentina 's 1978 world cup-winning squad , has courted controversy by calling up naturalised mexicans guillermo franco and antonio naelson , while axing legendary striker cuauhtemoc blanco . iran 's walking wounded already at a disadvantage meanwhile iran , who have set their sights on making round two for the first time , look to have serious problems with several players either ruled out or recovering from injury . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : iran 's players who are fit face a tough time against mexico with key attackers ali karimi and mehdi mahdavikia coming back from ankle and back trouble respectively , defender sattar zare twisted a knee in training and midfielder fereydoon zandi also looks likely to miss out after coming down with a fever . however iran , who have plundered a mine of information on their opponents , remain optimistic that the asian giants could spring a surprise in their " most important game " . " our coaching staff is analysing mexico really well and every player is aware of the mexican players and their style of the game .
we know how to play against mexico , " said captain daei . " i think winning against mexico is not unreachable .
mexico is a very good team but it 's not unbeatable . " the match also has a political dimension with iran , under fire for their president 's comments about the holocaust , playing in the former nazi stronghold of nuremberg . mexico won the two teams ' only previous encounter , a friendly on june 9 , 2001 which ended 2-1 . mexico -lrb- 5-3-2 -rrb- : 1-oswaldo sanchez ; 3-carlos salcido , 14-gonzalo pineda -lrb- 30-1 -rrb- , 4-rafael marquez -lrb- 65-7 -rrb- , 5-ricardo osorio , 15-jose antonio castro ; 6-gerardo torrado , 7-antonio naelson , 8-pavel pardo ; 9-jared borgetti , 10-guillemro franco . coach : ricardo lavolpe iran : -lrb- 4-2-3-1 -rrb- : 1-ebrahim mirzapour ; 13-hossein kaebi , 5-rahman rezaei , 4-yahya golmohammadi , 20-mohammad nosrati ; 2-mehdi mahdavikia , 6-javan nekonam ; 14-andranik teymourian , 9-vahid hashemian , 8-ali karimi ; 10-ali daei coach : branko ivankovic dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de ahmadinejad would face cool reception at world cup berlin was reserved in its response to iran 's president saying he would come to the world cup if his team made it beyond the first round .
the head of germany 's soccer association , however , said he would get an earful .
-lrb- june 5 , 2006 -rrb- world cup team checks : iran iranian soccer stars are becoming high profile with many securing big moves into europe and enjoying success there .
the national team is also getting itself a reputation as an up-and-coming side .
world cup team checks : mexico mexico has a big world cup reputation : while failing to ever get past the quarter-finals , mexico is synonymous with flair and the cause of more than a few upsets .
www-links fifa world cup 2006 the official homepage of the 2006 fifa world cup in germany .
feedback do you think iran 's involvement in the world cup will cause problems or lead to a thaw in relations and a change in perceptions ?
please include your full name and country with any reply .

world cup 2006 stadiums from the fringe have a laugh read about quirky happenings in thigh-slappin ' germany in this dw-world.de dossier .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 crunch time comes early for iran against seeded mexico großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : there 'll be no lack of support for iran as the team aims to escape the group stage mexico will be looking to kill off iran 's world cup hopes at the first hurdle on sunday as the world number four begin their campaign to make it past the quarter-finals for the first time . the surprise group d seeds , who have a point to prove after some unflattering reaction to their exalted status , will have been buoyed by iran 's injury problems and indifferent recent form . however they might also take the field without top-rated goalkeeper oswaldo sanchez , who has flown home following his father 's sudden death and is expected to be back hours before the match .
sanchez 's availability for the game will depend on his mental and emotional state . the opening match is seen as critical to the hopes of both teams in a group which also contains portugal and angola . " this is the most important game .
we know the game against portugal will be really hard also so we really need to gain points in this game , " said iran skipper ali daei . mexico will hope to shrug off sanchez 's likely absence and their own unpromising build-up which saw them lose 2-1 to a second-string netherlands team . however a fourth-place finish in last year 's confederations cup - including a 1-0 win over brazil - and a 20-match unbeaten streak have instilled a strong sense of self-belief in ricardo lavolpe 's squad . " mexico are very compact , aggressive and fast - actually , they 're excellent , " said lavolpe 's opposite number branko ivankovic . " sometimes they 're playing very boring , but very successful . " mexico looking to justify top four ranking key player is barcelona rock rafael marquez , who will be looking to make amends for his red card in the knock-out defeat to the united states four years ago . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the talismanic jared borgetti -lrb- l . -rrb- has a point to prove mexico 's all-time top-scorer jared borgetti , who totted up a world-best 14 goals in qualifying , will be hoping to send a message to club manager sam allardyce who left him languishing on the bolton bench this season . mexico have qualified for 13 world cups but have never done better than the last eight on home ground in 1970 and 1986 , reaching the second round in the last three competitions . lavolpe , a member of argentina 's 1978 world cup-winning squad , has courted controversy by calling up naturalised mexicans guillermo franco and antonio naelson , while axing legendary striker cuauhtemoc blanco . iran 's walking wounded already at a disadvantage meanwhile iran , who have set their sights on making round two for the first time , look to have serious problems with several players either ruled out or recovering from injury . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : iran 's players who are fit face a tough time against mexico with key attackers ali karimi and mehdi mahdavikia coming back from ankle and back trouble respectively , defender sattar zare twisted a knee in training and midfielder fereydoon zandi also looks likely to miss out after coming down with a fever . however iran , who have plundered a mine of information on their opponents , remain optimistic that the asian giants could spring a surprise in their " most important game " . " our coaching staff is analysing mexico really well and every player is aware of the mexican players and their style of the game .
we know how to play against mexico , " said captain daei . " i think winning against mexico is not unreachable .
mexico is a very good team but it 's not unbeatable . " the match also has a political dimension with iran , under fire for their president 's comments about the holocaust , playing in the former nazi stronghold of nuremberg . mexico won the two teams ' only previous encounter , a friendly on june 9 , 2001 which ended 2-1 . mexico -lrb- 5-3-2 -rrb- : 1-oswaldo sanchez ; 3-carlos salcido , 14-gonzalo pineda -lrb- 30-1 -rrb- , 4-rafael marquez -lrb- 65-7 -rrb- , 5-ricardo osorio , 15-jose antonio castro ; 6-gerardo torrado , 7-antonio naelson , 8-pavel pardo ; 9-jared borgetti , 10-guillemro franco . coach : ricardo lavolpe iran : -lrb- 4-2-3-1 -rrb- : 1-ebrahim mirzapour ; 13-hossein kaebi , 5-rahman rezaei , 4-yahya golmohammadi , 20-mohammad nosrati ; 2-mehdi mahdavikia , 6-javan nekonam ; 14-andranik teymourian , 9-vahid hashemian , 8-ali karimi ; 10-ali daei coach : branko ivankovic dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de ahmadinejad would face cool reception at world cup berlin was reserved in its response to iran 's president saying he would come to the world cup if his team made it beyond the first round .
the head of germany 's soccer association , however , said he would get an earful .
-lrb- june 5 , 2006 -rrb- world cup team checks : iran iranian soccer stars are becoming high profile with many securing big moves into europe and enjoying success there .
the national team is also getting itself a reputation as an up-and-coming side .
world cup team checks : mexico mexico has a big world cup reputation : while failing to ever get past the quarter-finals , mexico is synonymous with flair and the cause of more than a few upsets .

" mexico looking to justify top four ranking key player is barcelona rock rafael marquez , who will be looking to make amends for his red card in the knock-out defeat to the united states four years ago . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the talismanic jared borgetti -lrb- l . -rrb- has a point to prove mexico 's all-time top-scorer jared borgetti , who totted up a world-best 14 goals in qualifying , will be hoping to send a message to club manager sam allardyce who left him languishing on the bolton bench this season . mexico have qualified for 13 world cups but have never done better than the last eight on home ground in 1970 and 1986 , reaching the second round in the last three competitions . lavolpe , a member of argentina 's 1978 world cup-winning squad , has courted controversy by calling up naturalised mexicans guillermo franco and antonio naelson , while axing legendary striker cuauhtemoc blanco . iran 's walking wounded already at a disadvantage meanwhile iran , who have set their sights on making round two for the first time , look to have serious problems with several players either ruled out or recovering from injury . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : iran 's players who are fit face a tough time against mexico with key attackers ali karimi and mehdi mahdavikia coming back from ankle and back trouble respectively , defender sattar zare twisted a knee in training and midfielder fereydoon zandi also looks likely to miss out after coming down with a fever . however iran , who have plundered a mine of information on their opponents , remain optimistic that the asian giants could spring a surprise in their " most important game " . " our coaching staff is analysing mexico really well and every player is aware of the mexican players and their style of the game .
we know how to play against mexico , " said captain daei . " i think winning against mexico is not unreachable .
mexico is a very good team but it 's not unbeatable . " the match also has a political dimension with iran , under fire for their president 's comments about the holocaust , playing in the former nazi stronghold of nuremberg . mexico won the two teams ' only previous encounter , a friendly on june 9 , 2001 which ended 2-1 . mexico -lrb- 5-3-2 -rrb- : 1-oswaldo sanchez ; 3-carlos salcido , 14-gonzalo pineda -lrb- 30-1 -rrb- , 4-rafael marquez -lrb- 65-7 -rrb- , 5-ricardo osorio , 15-jose antonio castro ; 6-gerardo torrado , 7-antonio naelson , 8-pavel pardo ; 9-jared borgetti , 10-guillemro franco . coach : ricardo lavolpe iran : -lrb- 4-2-3-1 -rrb- : 1-ebrahim mirzapour ; 13-hossein kaebi , 5-rahman rezaei , 4-yahya golmohammadi , 20-mohammad nosrati ; 2-mehdi mahdavikia , 6-javan nekonam ; 14-andranik teymourian , 9-vahid hashemian , 8-ali karimi ; 10-ali daei coach : branko ivankovic dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de ahmadinejad would face cool reception at world cup berlin was reserved in its response to iran 's president saying he would come to the world cup if his team made it beyond the first round .

programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 live ticker : angola 0:1 portugal review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . group d : angola-portugal welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker for the last game of the 2006 world cup 's third day .
angola play their former colonial rulers portugal in day 's second group d game .
who will be on the field ?
here is a look at the starting lineups : angola : 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 8-andre macanga , 7-paulo figueiredo , 14-mendonca , 11-mateus ; 10-akwa -lrb- c -rrb- , 17-ze kalanga coach : luis oliveira goncalves portugal : 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 14-nunovalente ; 19-tiago , 11-sabrosa , 8-petit ; 7-luis figo -lrb- c -rrb- , 9-pauleta , 17-cristiano ronaldo coach : luis felipe scolari referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- an underdog in the truest sense of the term , expect angola to hang back and defend against an aggressively oriented portugal .
1. min .
we 're off portugal starts with the ball .
1. min .
what a start it is ! 14 seconds into the game and the ball is already rolling past the far post .
pauleta nearly got possibly the fastest goal in world cup history .
3. min .
figo crosses and angolan keeper joao ricardo gets his hands on the ball that was too close to his goal for portugal to make anything of .
3. min .
goal portugal ! 4. min .
pauleta did n't waste any time taking the pass from figo , who drew two defenders toward him , and drilling it into the back of the net .
7. min .
cutting the whole defense c. ronaldo dribbles through half the angola defense and is only stopped by stepping on the ball himself .
8. min .
corner angola akwa gives ricardo a bit of push while going up to head the ball away from the goalie and is called for a foul .
10. min .
akwa goes down after giving up one goal , angola push forward with a drive down the right side and akwa is able to head a weak ball towards to goal before falling to the ground .
12. min .
portugal line up a free kick .
12. min .
petit fires a shot that will certainly leave a bruise into the 4-man wall .
15. min .
joao ricardo hit in the stomach a collision between pauleta 's shin and the angolan keeper 's midsection has ricardo on the ground .
hopefully he 's only had the wind knocked out of him .
16. min .
with a bit of ice and a stretch , he 's ready to continue between the pipes .
18. min .
delgado tosses in a short throw-in ; miguel is there first to clear it to midfield .
19. min .
portugal are slowing down the portuguese players are slowing down the game 's tempo , making the rough and tumble angolans look decent .
22. min .
lonely in the back the portuguese defenders have moved up to midfield , leaving goalkeeper ricardo with only the fans in the stands behind the goal to chat to .
24. min .
simano and figo pass between each other , and simano puts the ball over goal , much to ronaldo 's chagrin as he was wide open on the flank .
24. min .
angola shoots mateus unloads from 35 yards out .
the ball sails over the crossbar , but it was enough for fans of both teams to take a gasp .
25. min .
akwa earns praise a bike kick inside the penalty area and now the portuguese defenders are beginning to pull at the forward 's jersey . maybe angola is n't as harmless as everyone thought ? 26. min .
yellow for c. ronaldo the ref warns ronaldo that he is n't at a judo match and gives yellow for a violent kick .
28. min .
this time jamba gets yellow a late tackle earns a booking for the angolan defender .
30. min .
half and hour into the game and angola are showing their passion for soccer with drives forward and aggressive attacks on every 50-50 ball .
32. min .
surprised that the ball landed in front of him , ronaldo is n't able to convert on a cross alone at goal .
34. min .
figueiredo tries his luck at a long-range shot , but it floats well-wide of the post .
35. min .
ding !
ronaldo hammers a header off a figo corner solidly into the crossbar and grabs at his hair in desperation .
37. min .
stymied by delgado 's arm , ronaldo , a well-known hot head who has already been booked once , works to keep his emotions in check .
38. min .
pauleta does n't get any power behind his header and joao ricardo collects it and send the ball to soaring to the center circle .
40. min .
simano slips at the edge of the box , the fans want a penalty kick , but the portuguese player does n't give the referee a look .
42. min .
ronaldo fouled again .
are the angolans trying to provoke him into getting another card and tossed out of the game ? 43. min .
macanga rifles a shot at goal that ricardo can only block over the end line .
nothing comes of the resulting corner .
45. min .
ronaldo rockets a shot after receiving the back pass and ricardo parries it in all-star style .
another case of bad luck for the portuguese .
two minutes of injury time in cologne .
45 + 2. min .
yellow for loco an extended leg attack against figo gets loco a place in the ref 's book .
45 + 2. min .
that 's it for the first half though the scoreboard does n't show the expected blowout -lrb- yet ? -rrb- , on the field , today 's third game has looked like the varsity scrimmaging the jv team .
whenever figo and co. pick up the pace it 's all angola can do to follow the ball back .
46. min .
the second half is underway ! 46. min .
no changes to either team for the second 45 minutes .
47. min .
tiago lifts the ball to simano , ricardo is there to stop the shot .
48. min .
just three minutes in , but ... ... the angolan defenders are doing a better job of swarming around the ball in their own end , keeping portugal from stringing together their trademark passes .
50. min .
what did i do ?
tiago draws a foul in a dangerous spot for figo 's foot .
51. min .
unsure of himself in the goal box , ricardo looses the ball but can take heart in the fact he may have missed it because he was pushed .
52. min .
macanga gets yellow macanga takes out the legs of luis figo - right in front of the ref 's eyes - and is booked .
55. min .
not until the portuguese get into the penalty box , do the angolans seem willing to defend .
57. min .
figo 's corner too long but loco heads it over the line for another corner .
simano shoots , but it 's blocked easily .
59. min .
in a 4-3 pauleta decides to go it alone .
his shot is n't placed well enough and ricardo snaps it out of the air .
60. min .
mantorras is in for akwa the captain hands the armband over to figueiredo .
60. min .
ronaldo makes space for costinha 61. min .
tiago helps in the midfield build up and when the ball comes back to him he fires at goal , ricardo falls on it and punts it away .
63. min .
the magic is missing portugal are doing enough to win the game an hour in , but the artistry expected against a lesser opponent has yet to appear .
65. min .
tiago gets the scorn of the crowd in the form of whistles for his uncreative back pass when supporters had hoped for a quick counter .
67. min .
miguel sprints with the ball toward goal , but kali breaks up the run .
68. min .
what should we do now ?
more than a little bored with what 's happening on the pitch , the crowd has decided to get the wave going .
70. min .
edson comes on for ze kalanga .
71. min .
mantorras , who just came into the game , is set up with angola 's best chance at a chance on goal , but connects with his shin pad instead of his shoe .
73. min .
defensive change for portugal petit is out for maniche .
figo can also be found on the sideline , but he 's only changing his shoes .
76. min .
mexico and iran wo n't be sure what to make of angola or portugal after this match .
the portuguese have a team of excellent players who are n't putting anything together , and angola looks able to stop most of what portugal throws at them .
78. min .
figo shakes his head taking on the current national dance , figo shakes his head in disgust - it 's a move all the portuguese players have been practicing tonight in a disappointing match .
80. min .
nuno valente sees yellow a tackle from behind on mendonca gets valente booked .
81. min .
miloy comes in for figueiredo 82. min .
hugo viana comes on for tiago 84. min .
simano comes close a header goes over the crossbar as simano is closely marked .
83. min .
what a result ! ?
angola wo n't have anything to fear if they bring this result back home .
the portuguese can expect plenty of criticism if the score line does n't change soon .
87. min .
pauleta twists and turns , it 's unclear if he stumbles over his own feet or if an angolan defender is able to poke the ball away .
88. min .
how wide is a field ?
plenty of whistles from the crowd as portugal measure the field 's width in a series of six passes .
89. min .
chance for angola mateus deflects a cross into a corner of the portuguese goal - ricardo is just able to get his hands on it in a shot that brought screams from the angolan fans .
three minutes of injury time in the second half 90 + 1. min .
simano crosses long to figo lets go in time for maniche to fire a shot ricardo pushes over the crossbar .
90 + 3. min .
that 's it in cologne !
and with an immense roar of happiness that the sluggish game has come to an end , the crowd begins to file out of the fifa world cup stadium cologne . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 11.06.2006 live ticker : angola 0:1 portugal review the action as it happened with the run down from dw-world.de 's live world cup ticker . group d : angola-portugal welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker for the last game of the 2006 world cup 's third day .
angola play their former colonial rulers portugal in day 's second group d game .
who will be on the field ?
here is a look at the starting lineups : angola : 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 8-andre macanga , 7-paulo figueiredo , 14-mendonca , 11-mateus ; 10-akwa -lrb- c -rrb- , 17-ze kalanga coach : luis oliveira goncalves portugal : 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 14-nunovalente ; 19-tiago , 11-sabrosa , 8-petit ; 7-luis figo -lrb- c -rrb- , 9-pauleta , 17-cristiano ronaldo coach : luis felipe scolari referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- an underdog in the truest sense of the term , expect angola to hang back and defend against an aggressively oriented portugal .
1. min .
we 're off portugal starts with the ball .
1. min .
what a start it is ! 14 seconds into the game and the ball is already rolling past the far post .
pauleta nearly got possibly the fastest goal in world cup history .
3. min .
figo crosses and angolan keeper joao ricardo gets his hands on the ball that was too close to his goal for portugal to make anything of .
3. min .
goal portugal ! 4. min .
pauleta did n't waste any time taking the pass from figo , who drew two defenders toward him , and drilling it into the back of the net .
7. min .
cutting the whole defense c. ronaldo dribbles through half the angola defense and is only stopped by stepping on the ball himself .
8. min .
corner angola akwa gives ricardo a bit of push while going up to head the ball away from the goalie and is called for a foul .
10. min .
akwa goes down after giving up one goal , angola push forward with a drive down the right side and akwa is able to head a weak ball towards to goal before falling to the ground .
12. min .
portugal line up a free kick .
12. min .
petit fires a shot that will certainly leave a bruise into the 4-man wall .
15. min .
joao ricardo hit in the stomach a collision between pauleta 's shin and the angolan keeper 's midsection has ricardo on the ground .
hopefully he 's only had the wind knocked out of him .
16. min .
with a bit of ice and a stretch , he 's ready to continue between the pipes .
18. min .
delgado tosses in a short throw-in ; miguel is there first to clear it to midfield .
19. min .
portugal are slowing down the portuguese players are slowing down the game 's tempo , making the rough and tumble angolans look decent .
22. min .
lonely in the back the portuguese defenders have moved up to midfield , leaving goalkeeper ricardo with only the fans in the stands behind the goal to chat to .
24. min .
simano and figo pass between each other , and simano puts the ball over goal , much to ronaldo 's chagrin as he was wide open on the flank .
24. min .
angola shoots mateus unloads from 35 yards out .
the ball sails over the crossbar , but it was enough for fans of both teams to take a gasp .
25. min .
akwa earns praise a bike kick inside the penalty area and now the portuguese defenders are beginning to pull at the forward 's jersey . maybe angola is n't as harmless as everyone thought ? 26. min .
yellow for c. ronaldo the ref warns ronaldo that he is n't at a judo match and gives yellow for a violent kick .
28. min .
this time jamba gets yellow a late tackle earns a booking for the angolan defender .
30. min .
half and hour into the game and angola are showing their passion for soccer with drives forward and aggressive attacks on every 50-50 ball .
32. min .
surprised that the ball landed in front of him , ronaldo is n't able to convert on a cross alone at goal .
34. min .
figueiredo tries his luck at a long-range shot , but it floats well-wide of the post .
35. min .
ding !
ronaldo hammers a header off a figo corner solidly into the crossbar and grabs at his hair in desperation .
37. min .
stymied by delgado 's arm , ronaldo , a well-known hot head who has already been booked once , works to keep his emotions in check .
38. min .
pauleta does n't get any power behind his header and joao ricardo collects it and send the ball to soaring to the center circle .
40. min .
simano slips at the edge of the box , the fans want a penalty kick , but the portuguese player does n't give the referee a look .
42. min .
ronaldo fouled again .
are the angolans trying to provoke him into getting another card and tossed out of the game ? 43. min .
macanga rifles a shot at goal that ricardo can only block over the end line .
nothing comes of the resulting corner .
45. min .
ronaldo rockets a shot after receiving the back pass and ricardo parries it in all-star style .
another case of bad luck for the portuguese .
two minutes of injury time in cologne .
45 + 2. min .
yellow for loco an extended leg attack against figo gets loco a place in the ref 's book .
45 + 2. min .
that 's it for the first half though the scoreboard does n't show the expected blowout -lrb- yet ? -rrb- , on the field , today 's third game has looked like the varsity scrimmaging the jv team .
whenever figo and co. pick up the pace it 's all angola can do to follow the ball back .
46. min .
the second half is underway ! 46. min .
no changes to either team for the second 45 minutes .
47. min .
tiago lifts the ball to simano , ricardo is there to stop the shot .
48. min .

51. min .
unsure of himself in the goal box , ricardo looses the ball but can take heart in the fact he may have missed it because he was pushed .
52. min .
macanga gets yellow macanga takes out the legs of luis figo - right in front of the ref 's eyes - and is booked .
55. min .
not until the portuguese get into the penalty box , do the angolans seem willing to defend .
57. min .
figo 's corner too long but loco heads it over the line for another corner .
simano shoots , but it 's blocked easily .
59. min .
in a 4-3 pauleta decides to go it alone .
his shot is n't placed well enough and ricardo snaps it out of the air .
60. min .

60. min .

63. min .
the magic is missing portugal are doing enough to win the game an hour in , but the artistry expected against a lesser opponent has yet to appear .
65. min .
tiago gets the scorn of the crowd in the form of whistles for his uncreative back pass when supporters had hoped for a quick counter .
67. min .
miguel sprints with the ball toward goal , but kali breaks up the run .
68. min .
what should we do now ?
more than a little bored with what 's happening on the pitch , the crowd has decided to get the wave going .
70. min .
edson comes on for ze kalanga .
71. min .
mantorras , who just came into the game , is set up with angola 's best chance at a chance on goal , but connects with his shin pad instead of his shoe .
73. min .
defensive change for portugal petit is out for maniche .
figo can also be found on the sideline , but he 's only changing his shoes .
76. min .

figo shakes his head taking on the current national dance , figo shakes his head in disgust - it 's a move all the portuguese players have been practicing tonight in a disappointing match .

89. min .

90 + 3. min .
that 's it in cologne !

goal portugal ! 4. min .

46. min .
the second half is underway ! 46. min .
no changes to either team for the second 45 minutes .
47. min .
tiago lifts the ball to simano , ricardo is there to stop the shot .
48. min .
just three minutes in , but ... ... the angolan defenders are doing a better job of swarming around the ball in their own end , keeping portugal from stringing together their trademark passes .
50. min .
what did i do ?
tiago draws a foul in a dangerous spot for figo 's foot .
51. min .
unsure of himself in the goal box , ricardo looses the ball but can take heart in the fact he may have missed it because he was pushed .
52. min .
macanga gets yellow macanga takes out the legs of luis figo - right in front of the ref 's eyes - and is booked .
55. min .
not until the portuguese get into the penalty box , do the angolans seem willing to defend .
57. min .
figo 's corner too long but loco heads it over the line for another corner .
simano shoots , but it 's blocked easily .
59. min .
in a 4-3 pauleta decides to go it alone .
his shot is n't placed well enough and ricardo snaps it out of the air .
60. min .
mantorras is in for akwa the captain hands the armband over to figueiredo .
60. min .
ronaldo makes space for costinha 61. min .
tiago helps in the midfield build up and when the ball comes back to him he fires at goal , ricardo falls on it and punts it away .
63. min .
the magic is missing portugal are doing enough to win the game an hour in , but the artistry expected against a lesser opponent has yet to appear .
65. min .
tiago gets the scorn of the crowd in the form of whistles for his uncreative back pass when supporters had hoped for a quick counter .
67. min .
miguel sprints with the ball toward goal , but kali breaks up the run .
68. min .
what should we do now ?
more than a little bored with what 's happening on the pitch , the crowd has decided to get the wave going .
70. min .
edson comes on for ze kalanga .
71. min .
mantorras , who just came into the game , is set up with angola 's best chance at a chance on goal , but connects with his shin pad instead of his shoe .
73. min .
defensive change for portugal petit is out for maniche .
figo can also be found on the sideline , but he 's only changing his shoes .
76. min .
mexico and iran wo n't be sure what to make of angola or portugal after this match .
the portuguese have a team of excellent players who are n't putting anything together , and angola looks able to stop most of what portugal throws at them .
78. min .
figo shakes his head taking on the current national dance , figo shakes his head in disgust - it 's a move all the portuguese players have been practicing tonight in a disappointing match .
80. min .
nuno valente sees yellow a tackle from behind on mendonca gets valente booked .
81. min .
miloy comes in for figueiredo 82. min .
hugo viana comes on for tiago 84. min .
simano comes close a header goes over the crossbar as simano is closely marked .
83. min .
what a result ! ?
angola wo n't have anything to fear if they bring this result back home .
the portuguese can expect plenty of criticism if the score line does n't change soon .
87. min .
pauleta twists and turns , it 's unclear if he stumbles over his own feet or if an angolan defender is able to poke the ball away .
88. min .
how wide is a field ?
plenty of whistles from the crowd as portugal measure the field 's width in a series of six passes .
89. min .
chance for angola mateus deflects a cross into a corner of the portuguese goal - ricardo is just able to get his hands on it in a shot that brought screams from the angolan fans .
three minutes of injury time in the second half 90 + 1. min .
simano crosses long to figo lets go in time for maniche to fire a shot ricardo pushes over the crossbar .
90 + 3. min .
that 's it in cologne !
and with an immense roar of happiness that the sluggish game has come to an end , the crowd begins to file out of the fifa world cup stadium cologne . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .
